title: Daily Star Digital Rebuild
subtitle: News portal modernization for Bangladesh's leading English daily
description: Complete redesign and performance optimization of a high-traffic news portal. Migrated to headless WordPress with React front-end, achieving 68% improvement in Core Web Vitals and 40% reduction in bounce rate.
story: Legacy media properties face a paradox: they have the content but lose readers to slow, ad-cluttered experiences. This project was about respecting both the archive and the reader.

title: Chaaklader Fashion
subtitle: Luxury e-commerce for artisan textile brand
description: Custom WooCommerce experience for a high-end Bangladeshi fashion label. Features product configurator, virtual try-on prototype, and multilingual support (Bengali/English). Integrated with bKash and Stripe payment gateways.
story: Bangladeshi artisan fashion deserves the same digital treatment as European luxury brands. This project was about elevating a local brand to global standards.

title: MedAccess BD
subtitle: Healthcare directory & telemedicine portal
description: A WordPress-based healthcare directory for Bangladesh connecting patients with verified doctors. Features geolocation-based search, telemedicine booking, prescription management, and HIPAA-aligned data handling.
story: Healthcare information in Bangladesh is fragmented and unreliable. This platform started as a simple directory and evolved into a critical infrastructure piece during the COVID-19 response.
